doc.title: House inAction
doc.plot: 'House inAction' is a vernissage... a party... a moment of freedom when art plays with everyday home life. Each room contains an art happening: installation, performance, costume design, video. The house turns into a gallery, into a place of creation. It slowly starts moving, suddenly fades out, finds its complete expression in video. It leaves its mark... tells its story. House inAction is a little revolution.
